showcase.title: Fail faster & succeed sooner...
showcase.subtitle: with KonUI! Coming soon to Svelte
showcase.content: We are developing KonUI to be the fastest collection of UI components for Svelte applications. It is designed to help you quickly build and prototype your mission. KonUI is still under active development, and we don't currently recommend it for production use. But be sure to check back in the New Year (2025) for the first stable release.
showcase.note: Note: KonUI is currently in alpha and under active development. We do not recommend using it in production applications just yet.

showcase.subtitle: Donâ€™t build tables... Generate them! Then edit each row on the fly.

showcase.content: Creating truly useful and versatile tables can come at a huge cost. It can be a real nightmare - both to build upfront and to maintain later. KonUI's table component is generated from a single JSON object. Each column is mapped from your configuration and each cell pulls data from your source. Conditionally render rows based on conditions that you set. Each row can turn into an embedded form in one click, allowing your users to easily edit data on the fly.
showcase.note: Note: We are working hard to get this feature ready to use! We do not recommend using it in production applications just yet.

showcase.subtitle: Own the full form! Generate, validate, and conditionally render fields from JSON

showcase.content: Just like your tables, your forms will be generated from a JSON configuration file. Each field is mapped from an array of objects. In them, you can specify a variety of input variants, from regular text inputs to options. Use our powerful conditions engine to hide or show fields based on the data in your value object. PS: You can use our conditions engine to set field validation too!
showcase.note: Note: We are working hard to get this feature ready to use! We do not recommend using it in production applications just yet.

showcase.subtitle: Quickly visualize your data with our collection of charts

showcase.content: There are many tools on the market that can help you visualize your data. It's important to take time to choose the right one. While selecting the right one for your project, why not give our range a try? From pies to bars, we have a range of charts to get you off the ground in no time. All our charts can be generated using your JSON configuration and data. Each is powered by D3.js, a powerful visualization library. Harness its power with minimal setup time and effort.
showcase.note: Note: We are working hard to get this feature ready to use! We do not recommend using it in production applications just yet.

showcase.subtitle: Over 30 unique components to choose from

showcase.content: KonUI hosts a wide range of components for displaying content, providing feedback, and handling various user interactions. Simply import our stylesheet and call our theming functions at the root of your application to enable platform-wide light & dark modes. Copy our template into your own stylesheet and add your variables to easily customize your brand. We aim to make multi-item components easy to configure so you can focus on the important aspects. KonUI is still in development, and we do not recommend using it in production applications yet. If you'd like to try out some components, check out our getting started guide.
